channel.title: Distributed Systems on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed Systems on Dixit Patel

item.title: Distributed Fault-Tolerant Stack
item.description: I like exploring new programming languages. I abide by this new age wisdom confected by a small group of computer modernists, ‘no such thing as too many programming languages’. It amazes me to think about the variety and complexity of today’s software requirements and the abundance of available opportunity to innovate across academic disciplines. As part of this exploration, I decided to learn about Go programming language. I implemented a Distributed Fault-tolerant stack.
